alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:42PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN GOSPER AND NORTH CENTRAL FURNAS COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM CDT... At 439 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a severe thunderstorm near Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, or 20 miles southeast of Curtis, moving east at 15 mph. This storm is stillo at least 20 minutes away from potentially impacting parts of Gosper and Furnas counties, and it is unclear whether it will remain severe by the time it arrives to the area. However, it does remain severe, a Severe Thunderstorm Warning may eventually be issued. This strong to potentially severe thundertorm could potentially impact... Holbrook...and rural southwestern Gosper County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
